game.name: Cat Adoption Tales
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Mouse Only Option, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Foster and care for adorable cats in this cozy 2D sim! Feed, play, clean, and send them on adventures to earn rewards, find rare items, and prepare each cat for their forever home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Foster and care for adorable cats in this cozy 2D sim! Feed, play, clean, and send them on adventures to earn rewards, find rare items, and prepare each cat for their forever home.
